title: Project Implementation
description: The second part of a 2 semester project design and implementation sequence conjoined with Technical Communications. Implement a project designed in CS 3311. Credit will not be awarded for CS 3312 and CS 4911.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CS 2340 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and LMC 3432 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
